verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--bhāla tattva śikhāilā more
eta bali' śloka paḍe gadgada-svare

synonyms: prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—said; bhāla—good; tattva—conclusions; śikhāilā more—you have taught Me; eta bali'-saying this; śloka paḍe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu recited the full verse; gadgada-svare—in a faltering voice.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said, "You have certainly given first-class conclusions." After saying this, He began to recite the full verse with a faltering voice.
